thumb.title: Sunset２
thumb.description: Verse 1: I hold on tight to the fading light, Wishin’ the sun would never take flight. But time don’t listen, it just rolls on, Leavin’ me cryin’ when the day is gone. Chorus: Oh, I’m a fool for the sunset, Chasin’ a fire that’s already set. Can’t see the stars risin’ high, Too lost in the past to open my eyes. Verse 2: I stand alone where the light used to be, Dreamin’ of colors that I can’t see. But the night, she whispers soft and low, "Let go, darlin’, let the new light glow." Chorus: Oh, I’m a fool for the sunset, Chasin’ a fire that’s already set. Can’t see the stars risin’ high, Too lost in the past to open my eyes. Bridge: Every end is a brand-new song, Every shadow’s where light belongs. If I just turn, take one step, Maybe I’ll find what’s waitin’ next. Outro: So I’ll leave that sun to the endless sea, And let the stars come shine on me.
